posts.title: Understanding API Testing
posts.body: API testing is crucial for ensuring the reliability and performance of web services. This post explores best practices and common patterns.

posts.title: Automation Best Practices
posts.body: Test automation requires careful planning and execution. Learn the key principles that make automation projects successful.

posts.title: RESTful API Design Patterns
posts.body: Designing RESTful APIs requires understanding HTTP methods, status codes, and resource naming conventions.
